epp:phrase.p: This page shows items which you have not yet deposited, which are still under review, which reside in the live archive, or which are already retired, depending on the active filter selection.
To start depositing an item use the button, and follow the instructions.
If you stop before completing the deposit, or a deposit is returned for corrections, it will appear in the list as in the "User Workarea".
Click on an icon to the right of an item to:

div.div: View Item in Detail, including additional actions!

epp:phrase.p: To reorder the list of items, click on the title of the column to sort by. Clicking a second time will reverse the order.
You may modify the columns displayed. Add a new column using the menu at the bottom of the page.
This page shows items awaiting review.
Click on an icon to the right of an item to:

div.div: View Item in Detail, including additional actions
Return Item to Depositor (and notify depositing user)
Destroy Item (with notification to depositing user)

epp:phrase.p: Items that have previously been in the live archive cannot be destroyed unless you have the additional eprint/remove_once_archived permission.
